Super Salvager.name: Super Salvager
Super Salvager.description: Defeat combatants with Super abilities in Salvage activities.

Treasures from the Deep.name: Treasures from the Deep
Treasures from the Deep.description: Complete a Deep Dive activity with the highest tier reward bonus.

Commendable Diver.name: Commendable Diver
Commendable Diver.description: Give or receive commendations in matchmade Deep Dive activities.

Pinnacle.name: Pinnacle
Pinnacle.description: Reach Power Level {var:1131227462} by earning pinnacle rewards.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Trial by Firing Squad.name: Trial by Firing Squad
Trial by Firing Squad.description: Win multiple rounds in the Trials of Osiris.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Broadside.name: Broadside
Broadside.description: Defeat targets in Gambit with Power Weapons. Bonus progress is granted for final blows with Linear Fusion Rifles and for defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Implements of War.name: Implements of War
Implements of War.description: Defeat targets with Auto Rifles, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles, Glaives, and Linear Fusion Rifles. Bonus progress is granted for defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.
